title: Into the flames
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Department of the Attorney-General, partner
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Wildfires - Australia

abstract: A personal account of the 'Black Saturday' bushfires of February 2009, from a young leader, a volunteer from CFA Region 14.
description: A personal account of 'Black Saturday' bushfires from a young leader, a volunteer from CFA Region 14. Simon speaks of his experiences fighting the blaze - monitoring where campers are located, through to anger from local residents directed at his crew in the heat and panic of the fires.
